column4: I want to install pyramid from https://www.pylonsproject.org/ .  How do I achieve this in an Ubuntuesque way?
How do I manage to include https://www.pylonsproject.org/ in my repositories?
This looks like it might be helpful: https://launchpad.net/~ukplc-team/+archive/pyramid
The pacakges look like they've already been included in the next release of Ubuntu though.
